name: Tech Haven
description:
A game made in 1 week for the WPI Game Jam

Welcome to Tech Haven. The puzzle game where you cooperate with your enemies…. IN SPACE!!

Reading this is not needed to play the game, as the game has the learning 
the controls built into the gameplay
Controls
WASD - move in any direction
Arrow Keys - shoot a ball in any direction(red bot), place a block in any direction(blue bot)
Space - switch control of character(only works for intended stages)
Shift - switch blocks(only works for intended stages)
Scroll - zoom in or out
ESC - pause menu
R - restart a level
Alt + Enter - Enter Fullscreen

Credits
Tyler Le: Programmer, Art, Sound, Level Design
Emiliano Hansen: Art
Zorrilla Cesar: Story
Benthan Vu: Art
Matthew Aranjany: Art
Lawrence Benitez: Art
Peter Canavese: Voice Over
Special Thanks to our parents and Robitcs team 254, and Bellarmine College Preparatory

Assets: 
music:

space bg: https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/space-package-1-1421/
sounds: https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/8-bit-sfx-pack/
https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/8bit-retro-game-sfx-9052/
